feed.title: Open Footprint
feed.subtitle: Software to manage your social presence on the web and enhance security.

entry.title: First post
entry.content:
With the site live we’re now busy putting together a how-to guide to keep you safe on the internet.

Filled with top tips and what to avoid, it should help you in your journey across the world wide web.
entry.summary: With the site live we’re now busy putting together a how-to guide to keep you safe on the internet.
